response_component: response component (cell subset) - entity whose change is being measured
cohort: cohort - any characteristics of the population(s) studied, plus whether the result was taken from a subgroup of the broader cohort tested.
age_min: age_min - age of youngest subject including both cases and controls
age_max: age_max - age of oldest subject including both cases and controls
number_subjects: number of subjects - count of case plus control subjects used in the measurement
comparison: comparison (affected vs control, correlated variable, time vs baseline event etc.)
time_point: time point relative to baseline event at which response was measured
publication_date: print publication date or posted date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY)
publication_reference_url: Qi et al. (2016) Defective T Memory Cell Differentiation after Varicella Zoster Vaccination in Older Individuals. PLoS Pathog. PMID: 27764254
signature_source: signature source figure, table or text section
proterm_and_extra: response component protein ontology and extra terms
pro_ontology_id: response component marker protein ontology ID
subm_obs_id: ID of observation within a publication (PMID) and for its submission type
uniq_obs_id: ID of observation within its submission type
